resources.string: B.E Computer Science And Engineering | 2016 to 2020

Worked as the Workshop Organizer for a Management Workshop named ‘Management 2.0’ in Kurukshetra (An ISO Certified International Technicno-Management Fest conducted by CEG). I worked profusely for conducting and hospitality for this workshop. I also had to administrate the volunteers working for the workshop.

This course taught by a professional bootcamp instructor. The course deals with all the concepts required to become a web developer from scratch. Which includes all basic concepts in JavaScript,HTML and CSS and covers tons of tools and technologies including DOM Manipulation, jquery, Node JS, database Associations, ExpressJS etc. It also includes multiple projects for a deeper understanding of web development.

The course covered the basics of programming computers using Python. It covered the basics of how one constructs a program with a series of simple instructions in Python. It includes many puzzles and projects to facilitate the understanding of python.
This course helps develop a deep understanding of Cisco’s features and functions. Also helps to gain hands on configuration and troubleshooting experience through comprehensive lab exercises.
Attended a one day workshop on Internet of Things organized by Frugal Labs, Bangalore. Where we were exposed to the basic working of IOT.
